sections.heading: Overview
content: Michael A. Sena, CFS, together with Kirsten Straughan, RD and Tom Sattler, EdD, is the author of Lean Mom, Fit Family: The 6-Week Plan for a Slimmer You and a Healthier Family . Sena is a nationally recognized fitness expert and maintains academic certification as a Fitness Specialist. In addition to writing feature articles for USA Today and the Washington Post , Sena regularly appears on CNN, ABC/NBC affiliates and Fox News educating the public about the health benefits of regular exercise. Voted one of America's top 100 personal trainers by Men's Journal Magazine , Sena works widely with the travel industry, sharing information on staying fit while traveling in addition to encouraging families to practice good health habits.
